resources.string: I\'m sorry without that permission the app is useless. It will now close.
Unable to save. Check your inputs and try again.
We failed to detect breath in time. Make sure you continuously breath into the device when prompted.
We failed to detect a deep breath. If this continuously occurs try holding your breath for 5 seconds before blowing or check out our handy guide under \'help\'.
We failed to detect acetone. Please send your device back for maintenance and check using your levels via a pricker
The internal conditions are unsuitable for detection probably due to prior attempts. Please wait a few minutes for levels to return to normal.
The reading was successful. Your current acetone levels are %f ohms\n(currently a measure of sensor resistance)
Heating the sensor Ready in %d seconds
